physical_appearance:This is a cushion cover. It has an orange underside
 with a square cotton embroidery featured in the front. The cover is decorated with stylized embroidery of figures and animals such as horses and birds
 surrounding a large tree in the center. The design is bordered by a repeated tree pattern.
